actions.name: Actions
actions.description:
Multi-Attack: 1×Bite and 1×Sting Bite [Melee Attack, Cleave]: 9 (2d8) or half to all Targets Close to its mouth.
Sting [Melee Attack, Near its tail]: 4 (d8) and pass [Endure] or become Sickened (+1 Fatigue for Cd12).

abilities.name: Abilities
abilities.description:
Sand Swimmer: Can Move through sand and earth using its Speed.
Bestiary Bestiary 146 146 Questing Beast TL: 4.8 Large Cryptid (Beast) A chimeric feline with a snake's head, a cheetah's body, and hooved hindquarters like a deer. Sounds like a pack of beagles on the hunt.
HD: 8 (36 HP)  Speed: 60' Zone: Frontline Morale: 9  # Appearing: 1 Senses: Darksight Armor: 2 [as Chain] ACTIONS Multi-Attack: 2×Claw and Bite Bite [Melee Attack]: 6 (d12) and pass [Endure] or become Sickened (Cd6 damage) Claw [Melee Attack]: 3 (d6)
